column5: Just watched Angler and Hunter and seen him introducing the show and fishing largies  Thought he was an FNC guy??
Noticed that this morning as well,he hasn't been on FNC for a while now that I think about it.
He is the new host of Angler and Hunter.
THe FNC guys talked about before MM left the show, although it may have been on their radio program.
It was announced in Ont Out of Doors last fall and Mike took over the show and Cam left for Pure Fishing.  F Y I  David  aka  Superdad
Ok Thanks--maybe a good opportunity for him??
